thread.title: Angelina Jolie Puts a Sultry Spin on This Model-Off-Duty Staple
thread.title_full: Angelina Jolie Puts a Sultry Spin on This Model-Off-Duty Staple

author: Edward Barsamian
title: Angelina Jolie Puts a Sultry Spin on This Model-Off-Duty Staple
text:
Angelina Jolie Puts a Sultry Spin on This Model-Off-Duty Staple January 29, 2017 4:33 pm Expand Photo: AKM-GSI 
Model Gigi Hadid set the craze for over-the-knee boots in motion about a year ago , and it seems that Hollywood’s best-dressed women are now following in her stylish footsteps. Actress Angelina Jolie worked the popular footwear trend into her off-duty wardrobe this weekend while out with her children Knox and Vivienne in Malibu. Jolie shoe choices are usually of a more practical bent, and she favors practical stacked heels or sturdy flat soles—the Everlane puffy bomber and Sorel’s fur-trimmed boots she wore in Colorado recently are a good example—so it was refreshing to see the movie star take on a more seductive look for everyday. 
A hybrid legging-boot, Jolie’s version reached high on her thigh, lending a sense of cool to her floating, boudoir-inspired top. A robe coat and skinny leather pants completed the look.
